coreAtributes.name: Rough Leather Armour
coreAtributes.description: A rough leather armour reinforced with some small metal plates and held in place by two leather straps going around the chest.

displacementText.playerSelf: You undo the leather straps and take off the armor.
displacementText.playerNPC: You undo the leather straps around [Npc.name]'s chest and take off the armor.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You force open the leather straps around [Npc.name]'s chest and pull off the armor from [Npc.name].
displacementText.NPCSelf: [Npc.name] slips out of their leather armour.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] opens up the leather straps around your chest and puts your leather armour to the side.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] forces open up the leather straps around your chest and rips your leather armour off your shoulder.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [Npc1.name] opens up the leather straps around [Npc2.name]'s chest and puts [npc2.her] leather armour aside.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [Npc1.name] forces open up the leather straps around [Npc2.name]'s chest and rips [npc2.her] leather armour off [npc2.her] shoulder.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the rough leather armour and fasten the straps around your chest.
replacementText.playerNPC: You place the rough leather on [npc.her] shoulder and close the straps to hold it in place.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You tell [Npc.name] how it is dangerous to go alone and equip [npc.her] with a rough leather armour.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [Npc.name] puts on a rough leather armour.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] puts a rough leather armour over your chest and fixates it with some leather straps around your chest.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] forces a rough leather armour over your shoulder and tightly pulls some leather straps around your chest.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [Npc1.name] puts a rough leather armour over [Npc2.name]'s chest and fixates it with some leather straps around [Npc2.her] chest.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [Npc1.name] forces a rough leather armour over [Npc2.name]'s shoulder and tightly pulls some leather straps around [Npc2.her] chest.
